body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, wagon maker. Kentucky native. Married to Emily Tolley. Married to Elizabeth Tolley. Father of Joshene Tolley, George Tolley, Jasper Tolley, Newton Tolley, and Shelton Tolley. Wagon maker in Ballard County in 1860. 1st Lieutenant in the 8th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) from September 13, 1862, to September 23, 1863.
